channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Role Based Pricing for WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Role Based Pricing for WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2022-3536|2024-08-03T01:14:02.420Z -- unknown -- role%20based%20pricing%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Role Based Pricing for WooCommerce WordPress plugin before 1.6.3 does not have authorisation and proper CSRF checks, as well as does not validate path given via user input, allowing any authenticated users like subscriber to perform PHAR deserialization attacks when they can upload a file, and a suitable gadget chain is present on the blog

item.title: CVE-2022-3537|2024-08-03T01:14:01.998Z -- unknown -- role%20based%20pricing%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Role Based Pricing for WooCommerce WordPress plugin before 1.6.2 does not have authorisation and proper CSRF checks, and does not validate files to be uploaded, allowing any authenticated users like subscriber to upload arbitrary files, such as PHP
